scripts.bootstrap: npm run _tmp_preinstall && npm i && npm run link:shared && npm run link:client && npm run link:cli
scripts.link:cli: cd packages/cli && npm uninstall -g prisma-multi-tenant && npm link
scripts.link:client: cd packages/client && npm uninstall -g @prisma-multi-tenant/client && npm link
scripts.link:shared: cd packages/shared && npm uninstall -g @prisma-multi-tenant/shared && npm link
scripts.test: npm run test:cli && npm run test:client
scripts._tmp_preinstall: rd /s /q packages\cli\build && mkdir packages\cli\build && call >> packages\cli\build\index.js
